snippet: The former U.C.L.A. basketball star Ed O’Bannon’s antitrust lawsuit against the N.C.A.A. went to trial on Monday, exploring the question of compensation for college athletes.

byline.original: By STEVE EDER and BEN STRAUSS

lead_paragraph: The former U.C.L.A. basketball star Ed O’Bannon’s antitrust lawsuit against the N.C.A.A. went to trial on Monday, exploring the question of compensation for college athletes.

headline.main: Understanding Ed O’Bannon’s Suit Against the N.C.A.A.
headline.print_headline: Understanding Ed O’Bannon’s Suit Against the N.C.A.A.
